Question.Subject: how to know if you won swagbucks swagstakes?
Question.Content: how do i know when i win a swagbucks swagstakes. And what are some good swagstakes to enter? Thanks
Question.ChosenAnswer:
You know when you win a Swagbucks Swagstakes when your name is put in the status of one of the Swagstakes you entered through this link: http://swagbucks.com/?cmd=sw-account. I think the best swagstakes would be the limited entries one especially because you can only enter once and there's a little bit amount of people entering them.
Your welcome! :)
Goodluck winning!
Also, for new users, please use my referral link: http://www.swagbucks.com/refer/GaryLuczon

Answer.Content: http://www.swagbucks.com/?cmd=sb-prizes This is the prizes you can win. Just go to this website: http://www.swagbucks.com/?cmd=home
